FuncDef:
The delay-measure one-way proactive receive enable command enables the receive end to receive DMMs from the transmit end for proactive one-way frame DM.
The undo delay-measure one-way proactive receive enable command disables the receive end from receiving DMMs from the transmit end for proactive one-way frame DM.
By default, the receive end is disabled from receiving DMMs from the transmit end for proactive one-way frame DM.
CLIs: undo delay-measure one-way proactive receive enable
Examples: [*HUAWEI-mpls-tp-meg-test] me l2vc peer-ip 4.4.4.4 vc-id 400 vc-type vlan mep-id 1 remote-mep-id 2
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable proactive one-way frame DM, run the delay-measure one-way proactive (MEG view) command on the transmit end. To enable the receive end to receive DMMs from the transmit end for proactive one-way frame DM, run the delay-measure one-way proactive receive enable command on the receive end.
Prerequisites
The ME of the MEG has been bound to a tunnel.
